text: nir parkkavillaiya? Allah vanattiliruntu nirai irakki, atanai pumiyil urrukalil otac ceykiran; atanpin, ataik kontu vela; veru nirankalai utaiya payirkalai velippatuttukiran. Appal, atu ularntu mancal niramataikiratai nir parkkirir; pinnar ataik kulamakac ceytu vitukiran - niccayamaka itil arivutaiyorukkup patippinai irukkiratu
